text: Serene and peaceful resting place. There are 2 chapels for ceremony/wake purpose and just beside a basement carpark, which is very accessible. The whole area only have 1 storey, which will help those visitors with limited mobility, especially climbing stairs.

So far the best resting place for Christian deceased, the atmosphere, ambience, wide space and placements of niches with surrounding pools and natural water music. A good place for peaceful meditation.

We love it here. Every visit of our parents here will give us the peace and knowing we have chosen the right place for them to rest in peace too. It has been 8 years. Staff at the columbarium are always so caring and willingly to help. Thank you so much!
Clean & peaceful testing place for our loved ones. Catholic Church in Bukit Batok area. Background music is played.
Great maintenance, clean very organize. Easy to acccess by public transport.
